message: When I click external links, they take me away from convore instead of opening in a new tab.
Sorry, I guess this is only happening on links like the one for the iphone app.
@ericflo The link redirects away from convore: http://i.imgur.com/p3R9j.png
@coudron Oh the app store placement does? Yeah.
I thought you were talking about links in messages
@coudron Yeah it opens a new tab/window if it's a link to somewhere other than convore.com
Sorry, I don't write bugs... I just fix them :P
